definitions.title: n. m.
definitions.body: archit. term, meaning unknown; projecting roof is conjectured (Sm Co Berthol); others landing (Da); AV RV thick beam or plank, RVm threshold; Benz Kit Toy leave untranslated; in any case a structure of wood;—abs. [[וְעַמֻּדִים וְעָב]] 1Ki 7:6; appar. cstr. [[וְעָב עֵץ אֶל־פְּנֵי הָאוּלָם מֵהַחוּץ]] Ez Eze 41:25; pl. (si vera l.) [[הָעֻבִּים]] v:Eze 41:26.
